title: Aging of mesenchymal stem cells
publication_info: S Sethe, A Scutt, A Stolzing - Ageing research reviews, 2006 - Elsevier
snippet:
The role of adult mesenchymal stem cells (MSC) in tissue maintenance and regeneration 
has received significant attention of late. Questions arise to what extent these cells are either 
subject to, or causes of aging; whether age-related changes in these cells are due to intrinsic …
